title: A Cut Above, Beautiful Patchwork [Epub & Mobi] [StormRG]
description:
Description
A Cut Above: Turn Charm Squares, Strips, and More into Beautiful Patchwork
Author: Gerri Robinson
Published: 2013
Publisher: That Patchwork Place
ISBN: 9781604683578
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android


Esteemed pattern designer Gerri Robinson shows how to turn ordinary precut fabrics into extraordinary projects for home decor.

Find 18 enticing patchwork patterns that use 5" and 10" squares, 2Ã‚Â½" strips, fat quarters, and fat eighths
Create classic designs and open up new possibilities for your favorite precuts; achieve a controlled or scrappy look
Get lots of options with eye-catching projects in a variety of sizes, including bed and lap quilts, framed pieces, pillows, and cushions
